mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upay_fund_account(account_id, balance, frozen_amount, vouch_amount, version, created_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{balance}, #{frozenAmount}, #{vouchAmount}, #{version}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM upay_fund_account WHERE account_id = #{accountId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT SUM(ufa.balance) AS balance, SUM(ufa.frozen_amount) AS frozenAmount FROM upay_fund_account ufa INNER JOIN upay_user_account uua ON ufa.account_id = uua.account_id WHERE uua.state != 3 AND uua.customer_id = #{customerId} GROUP BY uua.customer_id

SELECT ufa.account_id AS accountId, ufa.balance, ufa.frozen_amount AS frozenAmount FROM upay_fund_account ufa INNER JOIN upay_user_account uua ON ufa.account_id = uua.account_id WHERE uua.state != 3 AND uua.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY ufa.id
